base_description: Black remote control, elongated and curved.
part_description: Features buttons arranged in rows, including numbers and symbols, centrally located.
internal_interaction_description: Buttons are pressed to send signals through an internal circuit, activating specific functions based on the button pressed. The central arrangement allows easy access and organization, ensuring efficient operation.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with electronic devices like TVs or set-top boxes, transmitting infrared signals to control functions such as power, volume, and channel selection. Users hold and press buttons to operate the connected device.
